title: At last, abortion is legal for women in Northern Ireland - this was a historic night, but what now?
text:
From midnight last night, abortion was decriminalised in Northern Ireland.

It’s a huge change to one of the oldest laws on healthcare on the statue books – with yesterday’s law dating from 1861 – and to women in Northern Ireland it marks a momentous victory.

From this morning, for the first time, women in Northern Ireland are legally able to access abortion care in their own region. No longer will they be forced to travel over the sea to Britain – as more than 60,000 women have been forced to do in the last 50 years. No longer will those who can’t afford or are unable to travel have to weigh buying pills online and risking being prosecuted with continuing a pregnancy they do not want.

Bpas...
description: From midnight last night, abortion was decriminalised in Northern Ireland.
